content: Just curious... Image Library Browser: is there a certain reason why this search field is not included by default...? It's built within minutes... Screenshot-2020-09-21-at-16.15.22.png

Yes, there is: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3293

[UX] Exposed filename filter for media library dialogue · Issue #3293 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Describe your issue or idea With the new media library for the editor we have a great improvement in finding previous images. However on sites with hundreds of images it can be overwhelming. Adding...
I'd love to see this improvement get in!

I'm going to advocate for this issue:
